name: MovieFacts
0:
”Alexa ask movie facts to give me a marvel fact”
”Give me a random fact about any movie”
”Give me the new Lord of The Rings fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie facts
des: Just ask movie facts "give me a Star Wars fact", "give me a Lord of the Rings fact", "give me a Marvel fact", "give me a Narnia fact", "give me a Minecraft fact", "give me a movie fact", "give me a new fact about any movie", give me the new star wars, Marvel, Narnia, Minecraft, Lord of the Rings, Hobbit fact, and it will give you what you ask for. If you ask for a specific movie, it will give you a fact about that specific movie, but if you ask for just a movie fact than it will give you a randomized fact from all a random movie. Every Month I will add a new fact to each of the, new" categories, and put the fact that was there previously in the normal list. If 100 people use this skill in the next 30 days then I will add a whole new movie. Post a review by going to amazon.com and searching movie facts skill, then, scroll down and click, write a customer review.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
